CutSceneText.Text: Hmph! Do you expect me to believe that?
It's not like this is a bad deal for your side.
I'm curious to why you are suggesting this now.
Have you grown tired after only a thousand years?
You don't really need me to answer that.
I doubt Mesramtaeda or Tiamat would agree to it...
Well you really only need to convince Fregion, do you not?
You're trying to see too much at once!!
It's dangerous. Any more could be fatal.
